website_summaries.verdict: Good suction power and maneuverability are highlights of this vacuum, which is compact enough to store easily.
pros: This model is powerful enough to handle carpet messes even in households with multiple pets
Its lightweight frame makes for easy turning around furniture and tight corners
The handle of this compact model collapses, so very little space is required for storage
cons: The hose may be too short to clean high or hard-to-reach spots effectively

customer_reviews.title: This is a great, inexpensive vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, inexpensive vacuum! When we moved from hardwoods to carpet, I bought this one to tide me over until I decided which 'nice' vacuum to buy, but this one is great! It picks up better coming back towards you than being pushed away, and you'll want to hold the handle as horizontal to the ground as you can, but it picks up nicely and transitions from carpet to wood without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and inexpensive Vacuum Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the vacuum cleaner from past 4 years and it has worked great. I believe it works better on carpets than harder surface. Needs better maintenance (proper cleaning and timely change of filters) for good performance. It is a good vacuum cleaner for this price point. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who is on a tighter budget. Most importantly it cleans the stuff. The only thing that it lacks is a little bit of less suction power but for me cleaning the carpets it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Ashish Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great value for money. The suction is very powerful. We agree with lot of other reviewers in saying that it clean the carpet well and it pulls out dirt settled deep inside the carpet. The bagless construction is great. You don't have to worry about the supply of paper bags in future, whether the size is right for your vacuum cleaner and so on. The handle at the top of the dirt container is also thoughtfully designed. One can carry the machine using this handle. Does not take up a lot of space when folded away. Overall, the machine is very handy, lightweight, very powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Divu

customer_reviews.title: Don't call me a sucker!
customer_reviews.text: This little devil is actually quite impressive. It sucks just like I hoped it would! It's light weight, it stores nicely under the bed and it empties quite easily. It actually even manages to vacuum my hardwood floors too, without spraying the crumbly bits everywhere. To further convince myself this was true, I used it in the room with the two litter boxes. Truth. It did work on hardwood. SCORE!! This thing does way more work than it's price would indicate. Please note: this vacuum does NOT have the ability to adjust the beater height and it is NOT self-powered, you have to push and pull this thing like you mean it!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Sparks

customer_reviews.title: great suction for the size but does not stand alone ...
customer_reviews.text: great suction for the size but does not stand alone so it will fall unless it leans on something. Attachment is not long enough at all so I don't even bother but it will be good for someone who wants great suction and don't and any whistles and bells. Great product if you don't want to spend much for the quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and easy to run
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and easy to run. I needed a vacuum for the upstairs bedrooms that could store easily in a closet. This worksperfectly. The power is adequate for picking up surface dirt. It does the job I need. Some reviews have complained about the short chord. I thought the chord was fine. I trip over my lengthy downstairs vacuum chord. I also found this easy to use on my steps because it is so light. The only reason I did not give it five stars is because it is small and low so I have to bend a bit more to wrap the chord etc. For now, I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: R. Farrar

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, small, decent vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price! I've only used it 3 or 4 times, but it is light-weight and small and easy to maneuver around my small space. Seems to pick up the dog hair pretty well! The negative so far is the container that collects the debris doesn't empty out easily. The dirt falls right out, but the dog hair catches in the small space between container and filter....takes some work to get it out. Doesn't have auto-wind cord, but for the price I shouldn't expect too many bells and whistles!
customer_reviews.author: GrandmaD

customer_reviews.title: SO DISAPPOINTED- HUGE HASSLE
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE and HEAVY. Worked for one cleaning and then nothing. It is also very heavy and clunky for such a low performer. I have used light and small stick vacuums that do a 10X more effective job. Usually a vacuum like this would do a good job because it is such a huge machine that is a big commitment. Instead of something I can easily take out and clean with, I thought, I would go for something that appeared more powerful. It is large with almost no suction. Bottom line: BUY SOMETHING ELSE! My guess is that the folks who posted reviews may have worked for the vendor. It also has very low suction when even slightly full.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Girl

customer_reviews.title: Over all okay.
customer_reviews.text: Cleans well, but there's no height adjustment so it's hard to push on heavier pile rugs. Doesn't always pick up heavier items. I'm 5'2" and find it a little short to use, even at its highest height adjustment. Would be a struggle for someone tall. It's nice for smaller areas and the price is right, so I look past the faults.
customer_reviews.author: Imagination Station Gallery LLC

customer_reviews.title: A Dirt Devil miss...
customer_reviews.text: For years I have used the Dirt Devil vacuums and sworn by them. This one I knew was small and would require frequent canister emptying, but this is a real miss. It doesn't pick up well and seems to jam up a lot. I will hope for a regular sized one and hope it goes back to the old standards.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne R.

customer_reviews.title: feet) and it fits the bill nicely. I have been through 2 or 3 vacuums ...
customer_reviews.text: Does what you would expect for a $49 vacuum cleaner. We needed something for our family room (about 500 sq. feet) and it fits the bill nicely. I have been through 2 or 3 vacuums for $200 and they were no better than this little Dirt Devil. If only Hoover would bring back the venerable $89 upright with bags. This is a solid purchase for the money.
customer_reviews.author: timmyj3

customer_reviews.title: while the F2 filter that is recommended for this
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum is ok, but I cannot find replacement filters for it. The filter that Amazon leads me to believe should fit, does not. This vacuum requires a softer rubber buttom, while the F2 filter that is recommended for this, and that I bought, and does not work because the buttom is out of hard plastic - the filter does not fit! frustrating that I cannot find the correct filter. Can anyone help me ?
customer_reviews.author: Willie Dueck

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to block out light when trying to sleep on buses, trains, and planes. It blocks out light well, but the band puts uncomfortable pressure on my closed eyes. It would be better if the band didn’t run through the part that covers the face.
customer_reviews.author: Marena

customer_reviews.title: ... years for a new vacuum as I do not like the Filter Queen we've had since the 1980's
customer_reviews.text: I have been asking my husband for years for a new vacuum as I do not like the Filter Queen we've had since the 1980's. I ordered this and could not be happier. This little sucker sucks! First time I vacuumed the house I had to empty it 3 times. I proved to him the Filter Queen was not getting all the dog hair and dirt. It is lightweight and very easy to handle which is what I wanted. The great suction is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: A. Herrington

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum works great! It gets everything up on both the carpet and the tiles. My only complaints are that I wish the detachable tube was longer because it's hard to reach stuff when it's short and attached to a big vacuum. Lastly, the vacuum is kind of hard to push through the carpet. I have thick, long carpet, though. It doesn't bother me, but I could see an elderly person having trouble pushing it. I wish there was an adjustable height for the distance from the ground. But, the vacuum was a great deal! Emptying the container is super easy and you DON'T have to touch the dust unless you completely fill the thing up.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking for a vacuum that could handle hard floor and carpet. I'm very disappointed with this vacuums performance on carpet. Every time there is a string on the carpet this vacuum has a hard time picking it up. It does ok on the hard floors though. I found the hose suction to be a little weak in general. The only other thing that I don't like is the filter setup. It gets clogged very quickly and decreases the suction strength of the vacuum. Overall I gave this product three stars because for the price, it's not too bad. Hopefully it will last a while or I may be regretting my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: They just don't make em like they used to..Older model much better
customer_reviews.text: I had the older model of the Dirt Devil Upright bagless and liked it so much more than this model. This one is ok, but I don't like the canister on this one as much, it's harder to empty. The vacuum itself doesn't work as well and feels much cheaper in quality. It's ok for the price but just very disappointed as I loved my older model. Guess "they don't make em like they used to" applies here.
customer_reviews.author: Booksrmything

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and easy to use. Performs better than my Bissell. Powerful suction lifts up enormous amount of dust from carpets. We have two staircases that get high traffic. The width of the vacuum fits the steps exactly making it perfect for staircase cleaning. The vacuum brush also grooms the carpet and leaves it feeling soft and fluffy afterwards. My only gripe is the high pitch noise emanating during use. If noise were to be reduced by the manufactures, this would be a 5-star product.
customer_reviews.author: DIYgal

customer_reviews.title: This little guy is a champ. Been using for ...
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is a champ. Been using for a while now and it continues to make me wonder how I get so much dirt in the house! The filter adding/removing is a bit odd- I was nervous I'd break the filter when twisting it on and off originally because takes a bit more torque than I originally anticipated, but after removing and replacing it a bunch I no longer worry. The handle is convenient for moving it around as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well when not plugged up
customer_reviews.text: Every single vacuum cleaner gets a wad of debris and lint in the part of the tubing you can't get to -- the part that goes from the opening behind the brushes to the place where the main hose fits on. Even my bottle-brush dryer vent cleaner can't pull this compacted stuff out. This is never mentioned in the ads. At least once a month I have to unscrew the hold-down for the hose and spend a half hour with various brushes, curved forceps, and fingers to pull this stuff out. They should design that part to be straight and include some instrument to clean it out.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor B

customer_reviews.title: Money Well Spent but does Require Upkeep
customer_reviews.text: I have three very large dogs and so far this vacuum has worked pretty good. The hose doesn't extend far but the vacuum itself is really light so getting cob webs hasn't been that much of an issue. The only thing is the filter gets really full making the vacuum not suck and also spit dirt/dust out of the bottom and backside hose when using the accessories. Don't get me wrong it works great and won't do it until it gets full. Also clean/empty it outside, its a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Cait

customer_reviews.title: 4 years old, still going strong
customer_reviews.text: Got this 4 years ago when I was still in school for my dorm room, and still use it now that I'm back home. Works as good as day 1. Not the strongest vacuum out there, but it was $55 when I picked it up and it performs better than expected for a vacuum in that price range! Easy to clean, filtered, and compact size.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Really a devil for dirt !!!
customer_reviews.text: I did own few other brands earlier around this price but none sucked the dirt properly which made me to purchase this. Read a lot of reviews before I purchased which gave me enough confidence. This vacuum cleaner sucks the dirt to level what I expected. Makes the carpet clean and I don't have to repeat the process on the area already vacuumed. Definitely a good product. Easy to empty and the features in it are really good. Happy that I own it. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Thiyagu

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought the first one in early 2008. Good little vacuum with plenty of power and easy to store ---- really liked it. Had to replace it in late 2016 and wanted the same thing. Bought the Dynamite Plus ---- almost exactly the same as my earlier one except it now has an attachment. This change must be what is causing the problem. It clogs up all the time. Cannot vacuum 2 small rooms without it clogging. When totally cleaned out it works great but clogs very, very quickly. If you can find an old one --- buy it. But I would not recommend this one. 2 stars is probably more than I should be giving it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good so far..
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Has great suction but a bit of a high pitched squeal along with the normal vacuum noise but it's tolerable. Also it requires a bit more force on carpet to push it along, more than my old Eureka but that's not enough for me to return it since I only live in a small place afterall. I don't think I could handle pushing it through a larger house. So pretty good so far, it replaced my Eureka light pick up.
customer_reviews.author: IMCHlLD

customer_reviews.title: Great LIttle Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to replace a very old Dirt Devil model, which I broke the bottom off the canister, doing something stupid when I went to empty it. Used this and the other for the kitchen floor, only. This one is smaller, lighter, and more powerful then the old one. Makes it more maneuverable when going around kitchen stuff.. Glad I had a reason to replace the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Eric C

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the small size of this thing fool you, it's a sucking machine I've had mine for over a year and recently purchased another one for my boyfriends house. I have a 4 bedroom home with three kids and a dog.. It does exactly what a more expensive one would do. However like others have said the hose is very short, but for the price of this thing and the sucking action I get out of it I dare not complain about a short hose.. I'm proud of my vac. I'll be giving my boyfriend his today and I'm excited for him to see what a handy vac this thing is
customer_reviews.author: Destany Mcdaniel

customer_reviews.title: Decent Vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum works well for the price, there is a lot of blow out from the front of the vacuum though. I would suggest purchasing this vacuum only for incidental use. It works for us because we have hardwood floors and only use the vacuum for two area rugs. It does have good suction and a brush roll in the front to pick up hair and lint and also it is very compact to fit in smaller spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Li

customer_reviews.title: Best tiny vacuum ever!
customer_reviews.text: I don't claim to be a vacuum authority but I do get frustrated by the cheapness and lackluster performance of others I've used. This vacuum is the spitting image of lesser machines I've found in my local big box stores for comparable cost, but the reviews and specs left me unsatisfied. I had read some reviews on this baby and after much deliberation, I purchased it. If this sounds like you, just buy this one. It sucks, and it sucks and you change the filter (inexpensive) and it sucks some more. It is loud, yes, and I don't care. It is simple. No frills. It does precisely what a vacuum should: clean THOROUGHLY. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L.

customer_reviews.title: I haven't had any problems with this like others have
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had any problems with this like others have. I think if you have high pile carpet the belt might wear out or break easily - this seems to get very low against the carpet, which is why it works so well. We use it on both carpet and hard wood with great results, but our carpet is practically like office carpet (very low pile). Even on ours you can feel it kind of "pulling" the carpet because it's so low, but it sure gets up a lot of stuff! Yes, it's more cheaply made. Not sure what we all expect - it's a fraction of a price of a more expensive vacuum that does the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: FolkLore

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It does the job but it's very cheaply made. Definitely not worth over $25 it is very over priced. If I known it was going to be so cheaply made I would have bought a different kind. Another thing, it doesn't clean as well as I expected it too.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Duncan

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum is perfect! I've had it for about 5 months and ...
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is perfect! I've had it for about 5 months and zero issues or complaints. It is small and can be stores easily. Lightweight, handle slides down to make for easy storage, and best yet....it sucks super well. I use it on carpet and hardwood. It also slides under things well. You can basically lay the handle on the floor and the bottom wont lift up, so it's great for hard to reach sport or for getting under chairs and tables if your too lazy to move them (me). Only complaint, it is loud. If you're looking for cheap but quality vacuum this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Good little vac for the money
customer_reviews.text: okay so it does get the basic job done, my only complaint is that the hose is MUCH TOO SHORT and not very stretchy...so if you want to reach cobwebs in corners you literally have to pick up the entire VACUUM CLEANER off the floor with the hose to reach anything on even a LOW CEILING! They need a hose that has more stretch to it so it can reach further. And of course, the filters have to be replaced. They're not washable. It says replace them every 6 months, but if you have pets...you will have to replace them much more often than that! With several kitties in my house, I anticipate replacing them every month or two.
customer_reviews.author: Lovin Life

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. It worked fine for about four months, then became clogged with my pet's hair. I was able, with much effort, to unclog it, but I could not find another filter to fit it. The F2 filter that is often advertised as fitting this machine does not. I have called the Dirt Devil customer support twice about finding a filter that fits. The first time, the operator insister that the filter I was telling her would not fit would, and the second time I was told that the matter would be researched and someone would get back to me. I am waiting. Meanwhile, I bought a Hoover.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bamberg

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum ever
customer_reviews.text: We bought this vacuum last year when we moved into our new apartment that had brand new carpeted floors. I have major dust allergies so a powerful vacuum is a must. It picks up dog hair, dust, and a whole bunch of stuff that lives rent-free in your carpet. We vacuum weekly, sometimes more, and the amount of stuff that it sucks up is amazing! Keep in mind that this is BRAND NEW carpet - we are the first to walk/live on it and sometimes we have to empty the container to continue with the rest of the house. It's gross and awesome at the same time. Highly recommend. Don't let its compact size fool you. It's a beast.
customer_reviews.author: cooperoxy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Purchase
customer_reviews.text: After I had surgery, I needed a light Vacuum cleaner because I could not push or pull anything heavy for awhile. The cord was of an adequate length and the special attachment was great for smaller jobs. It was inexpensive, so I thought I had found a great buy. It worked well for about two months and it suddenly stopped picking up anything from the floor when I vacuumed. It would have been too much trouble for me to send it back, so I just tossed it. I guess I really got what I paid for that time.
customer_reviews.author: Pinky S.

customer_reviews.title: This machine literally sucks! Why one earth would you want to buy ...
customer_reviews.text: This machine literally sucks! Why one earth would you want to buy those expensive machines? This vac does much better and is lightweight and powerful! I have 4,200 sq ft home and it does all surface floors and furniture and sucks better than my dyson! Good job Dirt Devil!
customer_reviews.author: Froggie Russell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, small, low-frills
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is PERFECT for me. I live in a small (2 bedroom, about 700 sq ft) apartment with a cat and very little storage, and the compact size of this as well as its suction power have been invaluable. Obviously it's not the strongest out there, but for the price you can't go wrong. I've had this for two months now and during that time I've probably used it at least 2-3 times a week. I had a small flea infestation in my apartment and even with near daily use, this vacuum is going strong. It has completely exceeded my expectations and met needs I didn't anticipate having when I initially bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam H.

customer_reviews.title: Picks up so much dirt for being so small
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, on smaller side and does a great job on carpet. Is my second one since wanted the tools this time. Very disappointed that can’t buy anymore
customer_reviews.author: Sandra watson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I read many reviews trying to decide on a vacum. There was one reviewer that states, "This vacum sucks." This is a true statement. I was so impressed with the suction power of such a small machine. There are no tools required to put it together. The only part not connected is the handle whch merely slides in place. This little vacum is small with awesome suction so, if you have a large space I would not recommend it for you because it is small. For apartment dwellers, small homes, or offices this is the vacum for you.
customer_reviews.author: ms avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I was prepared for this to be an "ok" product, but I actually really like it. It cleans up dust and dog/cat hair well off our wood floors and carpet. It is also light weight and easy for me to maneuver. I had a more expensive product specifically for pets and it was a major problem, especially to clean. This is really easy to clean. My only issue is that it builds static and I have been zapped a couple times. I would still buy it again though, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hasenfuss

customer_reviews.title: Love this little thing
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a few regular size vacuums and they were just a pain in the rear, heavy and hard to manuver.. After buying this vacuum I will NEVER buy another big one. Ok, nobody likes cleaning but it is SO much easier w/ this compared to the big vacuums. Yes, I agree w/ the other reviews, the extension cord and the strech hose could be longer, but I'm not too bothered by it. It has great sucking power, I have dark area rugs and it picks everything up great. The dirt compartment is small and has to be emptied often, but that's no big deal to me.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Dirt Devil Dyanamite - Great vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: A great vacuum for the price. Not a lot of bells and whistles, and that's fine. Light weight, easy to use, and It works almost perfectly. It would have gotten 5 stars except: it's quite loud (a higher pitched sound than other brands), and it exhausts out the front (not optimal). But as stated - it works just fine! The Dirt Devil engineers did a great job designing it as well. The filter comes off and goes on smoothly, it opens and closes with ease, and it practically puts itself back together after cleaning out the dirt chamber. Would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: hlgoldberry

customer_reviews.title: Happier with this than any other vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love my Dirt Devil Dynamite. It is so small, light and easy to move around. I can't believe the amount of cat hair it picked up that my old vacuum left behind for over a year after the cat died! The canister does fill up fairly quickly, but it is easy to dump and rinse out. I bought it June 2014 and this is January 2016 and still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Y

customer_reviews.title: Best little vacuum, packs punch and stores almost anywhere
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small apartment with a hairy cat. My old vacuum was bulky and couldn't transition between the different floor textures (hardwood, carpet, tile). This vacuum is packed with goodies: Long-extending suction arm for corners, strong sweep on low pile carpet and tile floors, doesn't eat its own cord, retractable handle for storing, and it's so compact it will fit almost anywhere. Best purchase I've made for my apartment!
customer_reviews.author: DWalkerCO

customer_reviews.title: good for quick cleaning
customer_reviews.text: bought this vacuum for my daughters dorm room. It has great suction and is lightweight. Very easy to empty the tank. Does not scratch my wood floors with the brush still rotating. It is a little loud but no more than my Dyson. The cons would be that the cord is VERY short and the hose is as well. Not easy to vacuum stairs cause the hose is so short that you have to carry the vacuum with you. Keeping in mind that I'm comparing this to my Dyson which I love this little machine has just as much suction for only $50. Will be perfect for the dorm !
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Strawderman

customer_reviews.title: Have had it roughly 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I have used this vacuum in a studio, one bedroom and two bedroom; on low pile carpet, mid pile, cork and tile flooring. This is the best little worker that I've ever had. It's small, it feels cheap --yes, like a toy as someone else pointed out. But it does the job. I have a dog that is constantly shedding, so I used my vacuum more than most. Never have I been disappointed. It does wonders on carpet, okay on tile and not so good on cork. At this price, I don't fancifully expect it to function like a 500 dollar vacuum. However, one carpet it probably does do a comparable job.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Buy this Vac!
customer_reviews.text: Buy this Vac! The width is smaller than a normal vacuum and I think all they did was take a large dust buster motor and hook it to the brush but it works really well! This is great for an upstairs vacuum or in an apartment. There is a HEPA filter that is easy to clean. Long cord. It is a good vacuum and at only about $50 great. VERY good gift for elderly as well. Beyond simple and lightweight. Assembly consists of sticking the handle on the vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Good old school style
customer_reviews.text: Strong suction power. It cleaned the carpet very well. It is a bit heavy but overall it is pretty solid.
customer_reviews.author: Kwee

customer_reviews.title: I definitely LOVE this vacuum because honestly
customer_reviews.text: I definitely LOVE this vacuum because honestly, the first time I used this vacuum, I accidentally almost sucked my own shirt and it was hard getting my shirt out while it was still on. The suction of this vacuum is AMAZING. Definitely would recommend if you're living in the dorms or if you have a room to yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Nice powerful low cost vacuum cleaner. Bought this item based on Amazon reviews and was happy with it. It did a good job on cat hair, rug cleaning, and picking up litter from hard surfaces. Don't know about its durability. But operationally it's a really good deal. So far I haven't really seen any defects. It's got a hepafilter, which I like. It's got a sufficiently long cord. It also allows you to use the vacuum cleaner with the handle in a nearly horizontal position. All pluses. It is loud, but not objectionably so. For the price I didn't expect a muffler.
customer_reviews.author: BarringtonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Must do periodic maintenance
customer_reviews.text: Be aware, before rating this thing badly, you MUST clean the tubes out periodically and shake/rinse/replace the hepa filter after a dozen or so uses. It will no longer maintain any negative pressure if you do not do this. If it is well maintained, it has a lot of vacuum power in a small package.
customer_reviews.author: Brazensage

customer_reviews.title: Used Four Times and It's Garbage
customer_reviews.text: We have used this item a total of four times in the two years that we have owned it. We have used it to clean a couple of small rooms and purchased it as it is small to store. This item has no suction and when vacuuming and on the 4th use the belt broke. We bought this vacuum to use in a seasonal home without pets or heavy use and have found it to be a complete waste of money. I've had to instead transport a vacuum from home to do the job. Don't waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: One of the worst vacuum cleaners ever
customer_reviews.text: Cheap. Kicks up dust and dirt. You can't simply use the hose in between vacuuming. It's an either/or situation. You have to physically remove the suction hose and add the attachment and when you're done you have to put the suction hose back on. Very inconvenient. You basically get what you paid for with this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Sally O'Malley

customer_reviews.title: Just alright
customer_reviews.text: When I first got it I was quite happy with it, seemed like a great item for the price. Since then though it's had some issues. It seems to get clogged pretty easily. And while sometimes it works like a charm other times I seem to be going over the same area over and over to suck things up. It is rather light weight though it's not small enough to fit under any couches or anything more than a few inches. Overall I'd say it's a good buy for the price but I wish I'd have spent a bit more and gotten something different.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a birthday present for my sister and was concerned that some of the views mentioned exhaust being blown out of the front and causing dirt to fly all over. I am happy to report that we haven't experienced that problem at all. I asked my sister if she was having trouble with it and she looked at me like I was crazy. I used it myself, and cannot figure out what people are talking about. The vacuum has great suction, is lightweight, and it is easy to empty the canister. Considering that I paid less that $50 for it, I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: K. Clercq

customer_reviews.title: A small vacuum that works beautifully in my 3 carpeted bedrooms
customer_reviews.text: A small vacuum that works beautifully in my 3 carpeted bedrooms. The rest of my home is either hardwood or tile. This vacuum takes up little space and comes with great suction. Very easy to maneuver! Love the price, too.
customer_reviews.author: CARRIE

customer_reviews.title: I bought this vacuum cleaner in November 2012, so ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum cleaner in November 2012, so I'm reviewing after four years of use. I have two cats and have used this vacuum weekly to clean my apartment, which has hardwood floors and area rugs. I use it as a canister vac in addition to as an upright. This vacuum has no remarkable features but it is small and lightweight but powerful; I consider it very high-value if you're looking for a vacuum cleaner around this price point.
customer_reviews.author: mday

customer_reviews.title: Powerful sucker!
customer_reviews.text: This is one strong little vacuum cleaner....tremendous suction power for such an affordable machine. We have MANY dogs and lots of dog hair and this Dirt Devil works better than any we have ever had before. The only drawback is that the canister fills very rapidly, but that is likely because we are sucking up so much dog hair, so not it's fault! Easy to use, lightweight, and powerful....I will probably buy another to have in the other part of the house!
customer_reviews.author: Dee M

customer_reviews.title: Fancy carpet sweeper but does the job
customer_reviews.text: Old rugs in apartment I'm planning on leaving, just wanted something to keep them clean until I do, nothing expensive that I'd have to move, certainly not going to waste money on. While this has the feel of a carpet sweeper, the fact it is a true vacuum, If smaller and very light, does what I need. If you have new rugs in a place you're staying a long time, you may want to spring for the hoover. If youre like me, or broke, or need it for a college dorm, etc, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: newportmb74

customer_reviews.title: Three years and going strong!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this little vacuum for about three years now. It does the job and then some. I LOVE it. Suction is fantastic and the compact size really helps me get my home clean quickly without straining. I have a one bedroom apartment and it is perfect for me. But that is not to say It wouldn't work in a larger home. My mother has a large heavy EXPENSIVE vacuum at home and still asks to borrow mine because it is so much easier and still effective and she has dogs (so it works well on pet hair).If mine ever breaks I will buy another ne just like it.
customer_reviews.author: CheaDizzle

customer_reviews.title: GREAT, LIGHT, EASY TO CLEAN!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the vacuum we bought for quick cleaning... IT IS AMAZING! I have a Rainbow vacuum and an old Hoover, and this one was way easier. It's less than 8lbs and the handle is adjustable... it can get so short that my two year old son can vacuum with ease ;) (which he did and enjoyed... can we say a new chore???) It was super easy to clean too- you just remove the canister, dump out the nasties and click it back in place! If anyone needs a little vacuum for quick and good cleaning, consider this one!
customer_reviews.author: Leanne R.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS VACUUM IS THE BEST CLEANER I'VE EVER OWNED !!! I HAD ANOTHER BRAND THAT I'd BEEN USING AND I THOUGHT IT WAS DOING A GOOD JOB CLEANING THE CARPET....WAS I EVER WRONG!!!! I RE-VACUUMED WHERE I HAD JUST CLEANED AND IT'S UNBELIEVABLE JUST HOW MUCH MORE DIRT AND SAND THE DIRT DEVIL PICKED UP!! THE DIRT CONTAINER WAS ALMOST FULL. WE HAVE 2 DOGS AND 2 PEOPLE COMING IN AND OUT OF OUR HOME ALL THE TIME. WE LIVE IN THE COUNTRY AND HAVE A VERY SANDY YARD. I LOVE THE DIRT DEVIL, IT'S LIGHT WEIGHT BUT DOES DOES A GREAT JOB, AND IS VERY REASONABLY PRICED.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Has great suction. The dirt receptacle does need to be ...
customer_reviews.text: Picks up a lot of dirt for such a small machine. Has great suction. The dirt receptacle does need to be emptied quite frequently and the filter fills up and needs to be cleaned out after each use. I have replaced the filter after only one month as the other one was wearing out from cleaning it so much. The replacements are pretty cheap, about $4 each when buying a 3 pack, so just buy some extra filters when you buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A.

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this then returned it. There are 2 things you must know before you buy it. First, the height cannot be adjusted. It is some type of auto-height adjustment. It did not work well at all for my carpet which has a medium pile. I am 6-2 and of average strength and had a VERY difficult time pushing this thing because it was too close to the carpet. If you have a low pile carpet, it will probably be fine. Second, it is quite small. It would be appropriate for a small room or office, but not a whole floor.
customer_reviews.author: Chris the Techie

customer_reviews.title: ... vacuum nearly everyday but so far this thing has amazing deep clean power
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how long this will last because I have 3 big dogs n vacuum nearly everyday but so far this thing has amazing deep clean power. It's better than the edge, stick vacuums, n even better than sharks I've tried in past. Only thing I haven't tried is a Dyson which is simply cause of the price. This cost me 50 bucks n hopefully it will last me a year+. Bonus-I love the extra long cord!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great for clean little rooms
customer_reviews.text: If you plan on using this to pick up real dirt, forget about it! I thought it could handle just one little room, which was admittedly filthy after some renovation work was done. I thought I'd have to go back over it a few times, but absolutely not having any suction after one use??? C'mon. It made one pass & then was literally spewing out dirt instead of sucking it up & the canister was empty with a brand new filter.
customer_reviews.author: I.SOl.A

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum! Keep it clean and it’ll last well and do it’s job. If you don’t keep up on emptying the cartridge, changing the filter, cleaning the brush, etc. you WILL have problems. Belt is easy to replace if it snaps or comes undone.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my new apartment instead of movi with my old vacuum. It's small, light and works very well. Also much quieter than my larger dirt devil. Moved into a new apartment which appeared clean but after the first use on my carpets after being there for 2 nights the dust canister was 3/4 full. Works well on carpet and hard wood
customer_reviews.author: Flamdoc

customer_reviews.title: It works well, but is a little frustrating
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size vacuum for my condo and it is powerful for its size. The only issue I have with it is that you have to put a little muscle behind it when pushing it on your carpets. The handle comes in two pieces and you can push the handle down for storage in a small space. This is convenient put also frustrating in that when you push the vacuum, sometimes the handle slides down into itself because there is no way to permanently lock it in place. I think I might just get some epoxy and glue it together. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Exhiler8ting

customer_reviews.title: I works great.
customer_reviews.text: This replaces my burnt up older one, And Wow, I works great.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Russell

customer_reviews.title: Good Enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend's apartment just so he would have SOMETHING to vacuum with. It's not really great on pet hair on the fabric couch and it is rather bulky for getting into corners. His apartment is all hardwood and some tile - it does the trick enough where the place isn't completely grimy. If you have a home, animals, large apartment or any combination of those this is not the vacuum for you. This is a good dorm vacuum or quick picker upper for small jobs. Basically, this isn't an adult vacuum and it's not for clean freaks. It's "good enough" for small jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Moria

customer_reviews.title: great lightweight cheap vaccum
customer_reviews.text: I have horrible carpets - so I go through a lot of vaccums. I will say, this isn't the strongest vaccum, but an absolute fantastic lightweight, good every day vaccum for a small place. My floors are so bad that I had to empty it after every room, but again, if you have decent carpets and want a great everyday vaccum, this is it. FYI- it picked up just as well as my $300 vaccum that broke after a year. I have a large home with a basement, will buy another one for the basement.
customer_reviews.author: cmac

customer_reviews.title: Left me wanting more
customer_reviews.text: Is definitely a small vacuum that fills up quickly. Does not have a lot of attachments, nor a long hose to allow for a lot of movement so I would not recommend for the main household. Has worked well for what it can do, is easy to empty and change filter. It does a decent job picking up stuff but just doesn't have the power of a high end appliance. Overall, it is worth the money but I think I would spend the extra bucks and get a better unit in the future,
customer_reviews.author: Ed J. Lenart

customer_reviews.title: Great for an apartment or small area
customer_reviews.text: We just recently moved into an apartment and I needed a new vacuum, after reading a bunch of reviews I chose to go with this one. It is perfect! The compact size is perfect for storage and the suction on this vacuum is impressive, to say the least. I also love that with the handle down it is the perfect size for my daughters who so badly want to help with the housework. Hey, I know this desire to vacuum won't stick around forever for them so I will take advantage of it while I can. ;)
customer_reviews.author: MEH

customer_reviews.title: I had no idea how bad my old vacuum was working
customer_reviews.text: I am so embarrassed at how much dirt this is picking up off of my floors! I had no idea how bad my old vacuum was working. I knew it wasn't doing a great job but to SEE what is being picked up is amazing. I wish I had bought more filters, planning to order more now. This thing does a great job. Would highly recommend this to anyone needing an inexpensive, powerful vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great little vaccuum for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vacuum hoping it would be light enough that my girls could help with the vacuuming and not struggle with getting it up the stairs. It is a GREAT little vacuum!! It is a little noisy, however, it has great suction and weighs very little. I have a Rainbow that I love, however, it is HEAVY and my daughters cannot get it up the stairs. This little vacuum is perfect for them.....no more excuses for not helping out.
customer_reviews.author: C. Callus

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum for the Price
customer_reviews.text: My old vacuum cleaner conked out on Christmas day and I knew that I needed a new one and quick. This vacuum arrived earlier than promised ready to go out of the box. While it doesn't feel like a very substantial vacuum, I couldn't have asked for it to do a better job. It works better than our old vacuum that was at least 3x the price. At this point I don't know how well it will hold up, but like others have said, it really does have great suction which I guess is the most important thing in a vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Love how it lays flat enough to reach under the ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked so well that I might have sworn it was delivered with dirt in it. Love how it lays flat enough to reach under the bed. The only obvious negative is that you will need to take out the filter to empty the container each and every use since dirt tends to ball up and cannot pass otherwise, but it's easily done. Had a friend try and it and they ran out and bought two the same day.
customer_reviews.author: Creirwy

customer_reviews.title: compact and cute
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and very powerful. After reading some customer comments I do clean one room at a time. And leave the cleaner at rest for three minutes. Because most complain about the belt get melted. I live in two bedroom apartment. I am very much impressed with the suction power. My old 180$ big vacuum cleaner couldn't compete with this guy's suction power. One cons:cleaning the dust is little uneasy. u got to remove the filter by hand (which is covered by dust) inorder to clean the dust.
customer_reviews.author: Senthilkumar Elangovan

customer_reviews.title: Broke less than a year after buying
customer_reviews.text: Well, I suppose you get what you pay for, right? For $50, what can one expect? I loved this when I first bought it, but one day, about 8 months in, it just stopped working. Kaput. The motor worked, the brush turned, but nothing was getting sucked in any more. I didn't expect this to last forever, but maybe a year? Perhaps even two? I didn't even vacuum once a week, and then it was only my living room and bedroom! I have a tiny place. Ah well.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Duck

customer_reviews.title: Great for dog hair
customer_reviews.text: Just bought a second one of these after moving. Had the first one for four years and it worked well on both carpet and hardwood. For such a cheap vacuum does a good job with dog hair (our dog has short hair).
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could say "this thing sucks"
customer_reviews.text: I have a place with lots of small rooms - so I figured this might do the trick, the price is good. I'm kind of disappointed at how it doesn't quite seem to get the job done. Will do more testing and report back - as of now - 3 stars is generous enough. Edit: 4/20/13 - Gave this lil' vac to my mom who confirmed - it doesn't pick up well. Wasted my money here - docking another star. waste of money
customer_reviews.author: S King

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big man, but pushing this thing was hard on my back. It was advertised as having a switch to adjust for carpet, bare floor, etc. There was no such switch. I called Dirt Devil and was told that the vacuum was supposed to adjust automatically. It doesn't. Got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy K

customer_reviews.title: Decent vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: It said dirt devil "plus" and it was on sale, I thought it was going to be great all around deal. I was a little bummed out that it was only a 7 amp motor...and the filter is kind of in a weird place...the canister is really small, and it fills up really quick...and to empty the canister you basically have to remove the filter and there's dirt all over...the suction is really not that great either..I really didn't see anything "plus" about it..other than that it's a decent vacuum cleaner..and always, amazon.com is great the package arrived the very next day...
customer_reviews.author: eddie laufer

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Two thumbs up. Attachments work great. I have a dog and I saw no issues for over a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha kirkland

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum is awesome! We just moved and couldn't spend a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is awesome! We just moved and couldn't spend a lot on a vacuum and boy was this the right choice. The suction is amazing!!! It's compact so easy to store. Can vacuum an entire small home. Only downside is my boyfriend is 6'4" so it's a bit short for him. Other than that is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a fantastic value for your money
customer_reviews.text: WOW! What a fantastic value for your money. This vacuum does a more than excellent job. I recommend this highly to any that might be in need of one. Fives stars is not a high enough rating it is more like ten stars :)
customer_reviews.author: King Of Thunder

customer_reviews.title: Not What Expected
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum picks up great. However, it was smaller than expected and the canister needs to be emptied more frequently. The filter is on the top of the canister, and it partially blocks debris when you need to empty it the canister. It requires using your fingers to empty the canister completely.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Small-Leightweight-Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe that something so inexpensive, would work so well. This lightweight vacuum outperforms my old vacuum that cost 3X more. This thing will suck the paint off the walls!
customer_reviews.author: lautml

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum for the money! We needed a second vacuum to clean our carpet that is in the basement. We didn't want to keep dragging our main unit up and down the cellar stairs. It's a powerful light weight unit. I also used it to clean my car. . . the hose is a little small for that but it worked well in my Civic. Very glad that we bought it. Love this little unit.
customer_reviews.author: Francis P. Cardella

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed..
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, bit doesn't work well at all. It came in a beat up box that was all dusty, then when we put it together to run it it picked up like a dust buster, clogged within minutes and we had to stop and take it a part to unclog, after about three days the belt broke. Not impressed with this product at all and ended up going out to the store and buying a whole new vaccuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... has been said is true about this vacaumn--it cleans great couldn't ask for a better product BUT it by ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything that has been said is true about this vacaumn--it cleans great couldn't ask for a better product BUT it by no way does this weigh less than 8lbs. even my son said that just by lifting it--so I got on the scales&picked it up& found it to weigh 15lbs. I wish it did weigh less than 8lbs. as it is heavy but I will keep it for the over all big jobs and use my cordless for touch up jobs during the week!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B. Rose

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this for about two months and it's ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about two months and it's worked well for our 900 sq ft carpeted apartment. The filter is a little hard to clean if you have pets and don't empty it frequently. The pet hair collects and you have to reach in and pull it out rather than just dumping it into the trash.
customer_reviews.author: pretentiouskate

customer_reviews.title: Great suction!
customer_reviews.text: Really great suction but no height adjustment for brush (which I didn't notice whenI ordered) I have COPD so pushing this on carpet in the house made me breathless. I kept vacumb any way as it will be used on my patio rugs and will be easy to push on indoor/outdoor carpet. Very compact& love that the handle collapses for easy storage. JB
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: What a dynamite little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Service at Amazon is, as always, excellent. The Dirt Devil product is absolutely wonderful. Since I have a powerful hand-held vacuum, I don't need the extra tools. At 72 I need a quiet, light-weight, yet powerful cleaner for my carpeting and tile floors and this is just perfect. My Hoover, that lasted for 15 years, finally "gave up the ghost" and this is everything I need. Thank you Amazon for a wonderful service - I've been shopping with you since you started with only books.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Other than that - it's a great machine for the money
customer_reviews.text: It's everything they say it is...the only reason I give it 4 stars is the brush does not help it 'pull'. If you have deep pile carpet - it takes effort to push it. Also - the cord hook on the handle does not hold the cord when vacuuming - I cured that by using a wire tie to keep it there. Other than that - it's a great machine for the money!
customer_reviews.author: ronald fenner

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum for the price
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is very economical and efficient. Also it is nice and small and the candle stores inside the body, which makes it easier to store without wasting much space. Perfect for small apartments and rooms. It's great that you don't need to buy bags, only air filters every couple of months. The only thing I can think of to make it better would be a longer hose. Overall this is a great buy when you consider the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mextek

customer_reviews.title: works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I can't really get too excited about a vacuum cleaner, but it appears to do it's job. I bought it for my daughter to take away to college. I did give it a test drive before she left and it works as expected. Its not too big or heavy either.
customer_reviews.author: jasper60103

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking.
customer_reviews.text: I had this vacuum only 6 months when the hose broke. I taped it back together with electrical tape and the vacuum limped along for another 10 months. Honestly, I can't recommend this vacuum to anyone but people who live in a tiny apartment and have only carpet (don't need to vacuum multiple surface types), don't have pets or children, and have no need to use the hose attachments (because the hose is too short to do anything). Junk.
customer_reviews.author: TheTallGrl

product_meta.title: Dirt Devil Vacuum Cleaner Dynamite Plus Corded Bagless Upright Vacuum with Tools M084650 RED
product_meta.description: The lightweight and compact size make it the perfect solution for quick pick ups and daily cleaning. It weighs less than 9 pounds and features a retractable handle - take it anywhere - store it anywhere. Strong suction power and a revolving brush attack and lift dirt from deep within carpets while a unique Scuff Guard traps debris on hard surfaces without scratching delicate finishes. Automatic height adjustment makes it perfect for carpet and hard floors.
feature_bullets: Click-lock handle lowers to 31 inches for easy storage
Automatic Height Adjustment- adjusts to any type of carpet – plus hard floors
Includes an Extension Wand, Dusting brush and Crevice Tool

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars2,686 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Dynamite Plus Bagless Upright, Dusting Brush, Extension Wand, Crevice Tool
